content:
I am getting the following error from Grahame's server
Can't find the structure definition "http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/phd/StructureDefinition/PhdPatient"

I suppose that is not surprising as the SD is still in ballot and is not yet in the system. Is there a way I can circumvent this error so I can test the IG profiles?
you can upload the SD to my server

you can upload the SD to my server

How would I do that? Instructions anywhere? Or is this part of the FHIR spec I am ignorant of?

it's just like any other resource...

Should I upload all that <div> information ... its really big
doesn't matter whether you do or not
